name: Clove's Hootenanny
description:
Hooray! Today is the day for Clove's long-awaited Hootenanny!

... Problem is, it seems that things aren't as far along as everyone expected! Help Clove find and collect missing items for her friends scattered throughout several mazes in the animal forest!

Keyboard Controls

  • W - Move Forward
  • A/D or Left/Right Arrow Keys - Steer Left/Right
  • Shift - Sprint
  • E - Interact

Gamepad Controls

  • X (Playstation) or A (Xbox) - Move Forward
  • Left/Right on Crosspad - Steer Left/Right
  • LB - Sprint
  • Square (Playstation) or B (Xbox) - Interact
A CoyoteFoxGames Production
